name: Lust (Fullmetal Alchemist)
description:
Lora model for Lust from Fullmetal Alchemist. I feel it's best to use it at weight 0.8-0.9.

Use lust \(fma\) for the character. Other words used in training:

  • black dress, elbow gloves for the right look.

  • strapless to further make dress right, through this shouldn't be needed.

  • wavy hair if you want hair to look more interesting.

  • claws for long sharp fingers, because there's no bigger joy that AI fingers.

I've noticed one unusual behavior... my dataset had a lot of images with red eyes, and afaik she should have purple eyes so I aimed for that. If you're gonna get a wrong eye color and try prompt purple eyes, you might notice some other elements changing hue along with that :| probably because with red eyes her color theme is consistent like that.

modelVersions.name: V1
trainedWords: black dress, elbow gloves, strapless, wavy hair

meta.prompt:
((masterpiece,best quality, detailed)), hard rim lighting, dramatic lighting,

 <lora:LustV1:0.8>, lust \(fma\), black dress, elbow gloves, strapless, wavy hair, claws
